data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Some time ago I was looking for the module which can be used for
    creating multi-connection TCP server which will work in
    no-fork-available enviroment. I did not find anything so I have
    created the Net::Socket::NonBlock module for my own needs and wnt to
    publish it. I do not insist on the Net::Socket::NonBlock but I think
    it is good to have this module available and noted in the module
    list.
